title: _space.jsonc Schema
description: Schema for validating the _space.jsonc configuration file in weaveconfig.

name.description: The name of the space. This is used to identify the space in the graph. Dependencies reference spaces by their name. It must be unique within the graph.

dependencies.description: List of dependencies for the space. Each element must be a name of another space.

items.description: A string representing the name of a dependency space.

mapping.description: Mappings of environments from this space to environments in dependencies.

from.description: The name of the environment in the dependency.

to.description: The name of the environment in this space.

environments.description: List of environments supported by the space.

generate.description: Generate configurations or files for the space.

oneOf.description: A boolean indicating whether to generate default configurations.
Object providing options for generating configurations.
